verses.text: \w When|strong="H7725"\w* \w Jehoshaphat|strong="H3092"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* \w had|strong="H4428"\w* \w returned|strong="H7725"\w* \w safely|strong="H7965"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w his|strong="H7725"\w* \w home|strong="H1004"\w* \w in|strong="H1004"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*,

\w Jehu|strong="H3058"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Hanani|strong="H2607"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w seer|strong="H2374"\w* \w went|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w confront|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w said|strong="H3318"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w King|strong="H4428"\w* \w Jehoshaphat|strong="H3092"\w*, “\w Should|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H6440"\w* \w help|strong="H5826"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* love \w those|strong="H5921"\w* \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w hate|strong="H8130"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*? \w Because|strong="H5921"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w this|strong="H2063"\w*, \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w wrath|strong="H7110"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w you|strong="H6440"\w*.

\w However|strong="H4672"\w*, \w some|strong="H4480"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \w is|strong="H1697"\w* \w found|strong="H4672"\w* \w in|strong="H4672"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H4672"\w* \w removed|strong="H1197"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* Asherah poles \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* land \w and|strong="H1697"\w* \w have|strong="H4672"\w* \w set|strong="H3559"\w* \w your|strong="H3588"\w* \w heart|strong="H3824"\w* \w on|strong="H4672"\w* \w seeking|strong="H1875"\w* God.” Jehoshaphat’s Reforms

\w Jehoshaphat|strong="H3092"\w* \w lived|strong="H3427"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w once|strong="H7725"\w* \w again|strong="H7725"\w* \w he|strong="H5704"\w* \w went|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w among|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w from|strong="H7725"\w* Beersheba \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w hill|strong="H2022"\w* \w country|strong="H2022"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* Ephraim \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w turned|strong="H7725"\w* \w them|strong="H7725"\w* \w back|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* fathers.

\w He|strong="H3605"\w* \w appointed|strong="H5975"\w* \w judges|strong="H8199"\w* \w in|strong="H5892"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* land, \w in|strong="H5892"\w* \w each|strong="H3605"\w* \w of|strong="H5892"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w fortified|strong="H1219"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w* \w of|strong="H5892"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H6213"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w said|strong="H1697"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w judges|strong="H8199"\w*, “\w Consider|strong="H7200"\w* \w carefully|strong="H6213"\w* \w what|strong="H4100"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H4100"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w judging|strong="H8199"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w man|strong="H7200"\w*, \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w render|strong="H1697"\w* \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w now|strong="H6258"\w*, \w may|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w fear|strong="H6343"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*. \w Be|strong="H1961"\w* \w careful|strong="H8104"\w* \w what|strong="H6213"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w there|strong="H1961"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w no|strong="H6213"\w* \w injustice|strong="H5766"\w* \w or|strong="H3068"\w* \w partiality|strong="H6440"\w* \w or|strong="H3068"\w* \w bribery|strong="H7810"\w*.”

\w Moreover|strong="H1571"\w*, \w Jehoshaphat|strong="H3092"\w* \w appointed|strong="H5975"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* \w some|strong="H4480"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w*, \w priests|strong="H3548"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w heads|strong="H7218"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Israelite|strong="H3478"\w* families \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w judge|strong="H4941"\w* \w on|strong="H3068"\w* behalf \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w settle|strong="H5975"\w* \w disputes|strong="H7379"\w*. \w And|strong="H3478"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* lived \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*.

\w He|strong="H6213"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w*, saying, “\w You|strong="H6680"\w* must serve faithfully \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w wholeheartedly|strong="H3824"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w fear|strong="H3374"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w For|strong="H5921"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w dispute|strong="H7379"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w comes|strong="H1961"\w* \w before|strong="H5921"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* brothers \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w*—whether \w it|strong="H5921"\w* regards \w bloodshed|strong="H1818"\w* \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w some|strong="H3605"\w* \w other|strong="H3605"\w* violation \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w law|strong="H8451"\w*, \w commandments|strong="H4687"\w*, \w statutes|strong="H2706"\w*, \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w ordinances|strong="H4941"\w*—\w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w are|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w warn|strong="H2094"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w*, \w so|strong="H6213"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* incur \w guilt|strong="H1818"\w* \w before|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w wrath|strong="H7110"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w come|strong="H1961"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* brothers. \w Do|strong="H6213"\w* \w this|strong="H6213"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* incur \w guilt|strong="H1818"\w*.

\w Note|strong="H2009"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* Amariah, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w chief|strong="H7218"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*, \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w you|strong="H6440"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w pertains|strong="H1697"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w Zebadiah|strong="H2069"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Ishmael|strong="H3458"\w*, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w ruler|strong="H5057"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w pertains|strong="H1697"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*. \w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w serve|strong="H1961"\w* \w as|strong="H1697"\w* \w officers|strong="H7860"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w you|strong="H6440"\w*. \w Act|strong="H6213"\w* \w resolutely|strong="H2388"\w*; \w may|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w upright|strong="H5921"\w*!”
